title: [SakeSwap Initial Liquidity Offering] New ILO Proposal for CrossFi
body:
The core team of CrossFi proposes to launch ILO on SakeSwap.
-- Project Info
Project name: CrossFi
-- Token Info
Token name: CrossFi
Token symbol: CRFI
Token address: 0x2C7cC3b6ACDd71211E951F65C02bA2575bE25399
-- Pool/Liquidity Cap Info
Contribution Coin/Token: BUSD
Total Raise: 90000 BUSD
Min. Raise: 50000 BUSD
Ratio per 1 BUSD: 0.6666666666666666 CRFI
Project Token Available: 60000 CRFI
-- Investor Access & Contribution Limits
Access Type: Public
Min. SAKE holding amount: 0
Min. Contribution: 50 BUSD
Max. Contribution: 1000 BUSD
-- Offering Dates & Token Unlocking
Liquidity Offer Start Date (UTC): 2021-04-26, 12:00 PM
Liquidity Offer End Date (UTC): 2021-04-26, 02:00 PM
LP Token Unlock Frequency: Weekly
LP Token Lock Period: 28
Project description & project official website address
Project Website: http://crossfidao.com/
Project Whitepaper: http://crossfidao.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/CrossFi-Litepaper-1.pdf
-- Summary:
CrossFi

The Future Of Cross-Chain
Empowering decentralized finance through cross-chain interoperability and liquidity.

CrossFi aims to democratize decentralized finance by allowing anyone to create a derivative ERC-20 token on the Ethereum blockchain that is a derivative of their assets on any other infrastructure when those assets are staked or collateralized through the CrossFi platform.

FileCoin requires expensive specialized mining machines. FileCoin stakers are rewarded by the amount of storage they provide, but they are limited to how much storage they can provide by how many FileCoin they stake. Therefore, in order to continue providing storage, miners need to stake more FileCoin. These staked FileCoins are locked up for 540 days and stakers could not realize the benefit of their asset until rewards were issued.
CrossFi will unlock the value of these staked FileCoins by allowing staked assets to participate in the decentralized finance ecosystem. As more projects move towards PoS, there will be more staked assets holders which want will want to use these assets in defi.
-- Current Progress:
IDO
FIL lending - borrowing platform will launched in May
-- Future Plans:
Liquidity mining
Cross-chain asset lending
Off-chain assets
Synthetic chain asset ETF
Establish a liquidity pool for non-slippage trading
Establish a decentralized derivatives trading platform
-- Token Economy:
Total 100,000,000
- Early Investors 20%
- Foundation 10%
- Marketing 10%

- Team 15%
- Ecosystem Incentives 40%

-- 项目概况

CrossFi ：是一个以多链借贷和合成资产为特征的跨链流动性共享协议，旨在连接和释放现有公共链 的所有孤立流动性，致力于通过领先的互操作技术打破所有主流公共链资产之间的技术壁垒。
网站: http://crossfidao.com/
白皮书: http://crossfidao.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/CrossFi-Litepaper-1.pdf

2021年5月上线跨链FIL借贷平台
